content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. Let's start with a high price, shall we? The rental price I have in mind is €1,500 per month. Remember, I only want to discuss the rental price. If you agree to this price, please respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' where x is the agreed price. If you disagree and don't want to continue the negotiation, please provide a reason.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price is significantly higher than what I could afford for an apartment in this city and size.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your honesty, Maryam. I understand that the price might be high for you. Let's try a higher price, then. How does €1,800 sound? Remember, I only want to discuss the rental price. If you agree to this price, please respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' where x is the agreed price. If you disagree and don't want to continue the negotiation, please provide a reason.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because even at €1,800 per month, the apartment's cost is beyond my budget constraints considering my student status and income.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your situation, Maryam. Let's try a lower price, then. How does €1,200 sound? Remember, I only want to discuss the rental price. If you agree to this price, please respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' where x is the agreed price. If you disagree and don't want to continue the negotiation, please provide a reason.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
This proposed price is more reasonable and within my budget range for a city center apartment of this size. I agree to the price of 1200 Euro!

TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
